channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 16th April
item.description:
FMS enquiry fwd by CBC 15.04.25
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 16th April
item.description:
Customer reports cracked slabs at the location; they state that they have reported these on multiple occasions previously, but nothing has been done. They have tripped on them today and sustained multiple grazes/cuts. Please can Highways investigate.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
